title: Shop keeps closing my client
body: Go to purchase RP, it works up until i have to enter my card details or paypal account and then the client just closes. is this happening to anyone else?

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is dropping its connection to our servers entirely. I would address this by confirming your network configuration is compatible with the settings listed in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if this helped.
